entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Bank
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to rain late this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023
